sentences.english: Fenghuangshan bamboo slips are the important tax information of the Han Dynasty .

sentences.english: In 1982, they found another 22 bamboo slips in Jiaqu Houguan.
sentences.chinese: 1982年，又于甲渠候官遗址发现22枚汉简。

sentences.english: This paper lodges that the ancient books colophon began in Hart Dynastys letters, appeared in Tang Dynasty.
